prompt_text:
Content Title Creation Brief
Objective: craft 5 link-ready titles for https://razedcasino.com that feel at home on allpcworld.com.

Reference SERP keyword: casino crypto
Anchor keyword (use only if natural): razedcasino.com

Anchor operates in: Unspecified

Reference titles:
- 6 Ways In Order To Start An On The Internet Casin
- ALLPCWorld - Page 803 of 987 - Free Apps One Click Away
- Utilities Archives - Page 150 of 152
- TorGuard 4 Free Download

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of allpcworld.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to allpcworld.com while naturally justifying a link to https://razedcasino.com.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude razedcasino.com and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
